name: Baratie - Food Ordering App
desc: Online Food Delivery App, enables users to filter dishes by category, add them to cart, and automatically updates the total amount.

name: Youtube Clone
desc: Developed using React.js and integrated with the YouTube API, this clone allows users to filter videos by tags, search by name

name: Visualizer
desc: depicts how various algorithms work in real-time by displaying a visual representation of their execution.

name: Employee Management App
desc: Implemented using the Django framework, enables users to perform CRUD operations on employee details. Through this project, I gained skills in Django's Model-View-Template (MVT) architecture.

name: Automatic Time Table
desc: can be used by the authorities to create an automatic timetable when given raw details such that there are no timing clashes in the period scheduling.

name: Quiz-Game--API-Project
desc: Built using API and JavaScript for users to test their knowledge on a variety of topics.

name: Dictionary and Translator
desc: Dictionary and translator website using APIs and fetch methods.
